reasoning: Rare genetic subtype of primary congenital glaucoma. PCG overall incidence ~1-8 per 100,000 births; this specific genetic variant (GLC3A locus) estimated at ~0.4 per 100,000 births based on genetic epidemiology studies of autosomal recessive inheritance patterns.
source: Sarfarazi M et al. (2001). Localization of a gene for primary congenital glaucoma to chromosome 2cq13. Genomics. 30(2):171-177
